title: GD, an urgent cause has come to my attention
body:
And I need your help.

There is actually no term for a gathering of koalas. As you can imagine, I will not let this stand.

While my gut instinct leans towards "A rabble of koalas", it's already taken by butterflies, those thieving bastards.

So instead, I found a petition for the name of "A scuffle of koalas". I find this acceptable. 

I need 17 more people to sign this petition, because how else will the world know how to describe a large uniform gathering of koalas?

Please, lend your signatures.

For the Koalas!

https://www.causes.com/causes/522493-a-group-of-koalas-is-a-scuffle

And here's a baby koala:

http://cdn.cutestpaw.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/10/l-Just-a-baby-Koala.jpg

There's more where that's from, just keep the signatures flowing.

Update: **4 MORE GUYS**
